Plot: Inspired by true accounts, this HBO miniseries focuses on a group of fictional characters caught up in the harrowing aftermath of the tsunami that devastated the coast of Thailand two years ago.
Title: Tsunami: The Aftermath
Actors: Hugh Bonneville, Gina McKee, Samrit Machielsen, Grirggiat Punpiputt
Awards: Nominated for 3 Golden Globes. Another 3 wins & 23 nominations.
